name: Skeletons VS Nadia
description:
Skeletons VS Nadia is an incredibly cool third person game with beautiful graphics! In this game you have to play as a naked girl Nadya, who needs to get out of the cursed forest. There are a lot of lustful skeletons in this forest who want to kill you!
In this game, you will need to collect 10 dildos to get out of the forest filled with cursed skeletons! You can hit them with your huge club to kill them. But be careful! Skeletons can form a large pack and will chase you to kill you. This is the biggest horde of skeletons you've ever seen!
Game Features:
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Beautiful naked Nadia!
Very beautiful graphics!
Large hordes of skeletons!
Cool, incredibly beautiful forest!
